legsType.Wiki: Determines basic leg behavior. Value references are unknown.

weaponParamId.Wiki: Refers to EquipParamWeapon. Used to define scanner for with head parts, unknown usage with core parts.

quickBoostVelocity.Wiki: Referred to in-game as "Jump Distance". Does not affect jump distance.

quickBoostVerticalVelocity_Grounded.Wiki: Vertical velocity gained from quick boosting while on the ground.

boostModeJumpHorizontalSpeedBonus.AltName: Boost Mode Jump: Horizontal Speed Bonus
boostModeJumpHorizontalSpeedBonus.Wiki: When boosting then jumping, takes current speed and multiplies it by this value then adds it to current speed.

jumpVelocityVertical.Wiki: Amount of vertical velocity when jumping.

jumpVelocityAcceleration.Wiki: How quickly jump reaches max velocity and velocity ends. Interrupted by boosting.

jumpVelocityHorizontal.Wiki: Amount of horizontal velocity when jumping and before aerial boosting.\nDoes not affect baby boost.

jumpVelocityHorizontalTransferred.Wiki: Amount of vertical jump velocity to transfer into horizontal velocity.

unkDisplayLegsJumpDistance.Wiki: Seemingly does nothing. UI element for "Jump Distance" is governed by quickBoostVelocity.

displayLegsJumpHeight.Wiki: >Only affects value displayed in UI. Use jumpVelocityAcceleration for actual effects.

armsLoadLimit.Wiki: Maximum weapon weight arms can handle before being overloaded.

armRecoilControl.Wiki: Affects how quickly weapon spread grows and shrinks while firing.

armsMeleeSpecialization.Wiki: Increases melee weapon damage. Minimum of 0 (+0% damage), maximum of 200 (+200% damage).

systemRecovery.Wiki: Actual effects of System Recovery stat, which increases resistance to status effects.

systemRecovery_Display.Wiki: UI value of System Recovery stat. See systemRecovery for actual effects.

babyBoostSlowWalkVelocity_Grounded.Name: Baby Boost Slow Walk Velocity (Grounded)
babyBoostSlowWalkVelocity_Grounded.Wiki: Velocity when baby boost state is active, which replaces walk animations (requires SpEffect 9080).

babyBoostWalkVelocity_Grounded.Name: Baby Boost Walk Velocity (Grounded)
babyBoostWalkVelocity_Grounded.Wiki: Velocity when baby boost state is active, which replaces walk animations (requires SpEffect 9080).

legsBrakingCorrection.Wiki: Affects velocity lost during grounded deceleration.

recoilKnockbackVelocityCorrection_Ground.Wiki: Multiplier of backwards velocity applied to the shooter when using a weapon on the ground.\nApplies conditionally, such as not applying when AC has tank legs.

recoilKnockbackVelocityCorrection_Airbor.Wiki: Multiplier of backwards velocity applied to the shooter when using a weapon in the air.

backWeaponHeightAdjustment.Wiki: Affects how high back weapons are placed, larger values are higher. Values range from 0 to 2.
